T07vakobhku:4: tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam // VAkK_1.1 //
T07vakobhku:5: prajñāmalā sānucarābhidharmaḥ tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram /
T07vakobhku:6: tasyārthato 'smin samanupraveśāt sa cā śrayo 'syetyabhidharmakośam // VAkK_1.2 //
T07vakobhku:7: dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
T07vakobhku:8: kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā // VAkK_1.3 //
T07vakobhku:12: ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca tatrākāśamanāvṛtiḥ // VAkK_1.5 //
T07vakobhku:16: sa evādhvā kathāvastu saniḥsārāḥ savastukāḥ // VAkK_1.7 //
T07vakobhku:18: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te // VAkK_1.8 //
T07vakobhku:28: āpastejaśca vāyustu dhātureva tathāpi ca // VAkK_1.13 //
T07vakobhku:33: vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ mana āyatanaṃ ca tat /
T07vakobhku:34: dhātavaḥ sapta ca matāḥ ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho mahaḥ // VAkK_1.16 //
T07vakobhku:40: dvitve 'pi cakṣurādīnāṃ śobhārtha tu dvayodbhavaḥ // VAkK_1.19 //
T07vakobhku:60: rūpiṇaḥ avyākṛtā aṣṭau ta evārūpaśabdakāḥ // VAkK_1.29 //
T07vakobhku:64: sāsravānāsravā ete trayaḥ śeṣāstu sāsravāḥ // VAkK_1.31 //
T07vakobhku:68: tau prajñāmānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī // VAkK_1.33 //
T07vakobhku:70: navānupāttā te cāṣṭau śabdaśca anye nava dvidhā // VAkK_1.34 //
T07vakobhku:71: spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ /
T07vakobhku:73: chinatti chidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātu catuṣṭayam /
T07vakobhku:76: na śabdaḥ apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandika vipākajāḥ // VAkK_1.37 //
T07vakobhku:78: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca // VAkK_1.38 //
T07vakobhku:80: sabhāgaḥ tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ yo na svakarmakṛt // VAkK_1.39 //
T07vakobhku:81: daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca antyāstrayastridhā /
T07vakobhku:82: na dṛṣṭiheyamakliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpyaṣaṣṭhajam // VAkK_1.40 //
T07vakobhku:85: cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi sabhāgaṃ na tadāśritam /
T07vakobhku:86: vijñānaṃ dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ // VAkK_1.42 //
T07vakobhku:93: na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ ūrdhvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /
T07vakobhku:94: vijñānaṃ ca asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ // VAkK_1.46 //
T07vakobhku:95: tathā śrotraṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam /
T07vakobhku:97: pañca bāhyā divijñeyāḥ nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
T07vakobhku:98: dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ // VAkK_1.48 //
T07vakobhku:99: abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
T07vakobhku:100: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T07vakobhku:101: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
T07vakobhku:109: jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ // VAkK_2.3 //
T07vakobhku:113: saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam // VAkK_2.5 //
T07vakobhku:117: śātā dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam // VAkK_2.7 //
T07vakobhku:118: anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ aśātā caitasī punaḥ /
T07vakobhku:119: daurmanasyamupekṣā tu madhyā ubhayī avikalpanāt // VAkK_2.8 //
T07vakobhku:121: rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi dvidhā nava // VAkK_2.9 //
T07vakobhku:123: daurmanasyācca tattvekaṃ savipākaṃ daśa dvidhā // VAkK_2.10 //
T07vakobhku:125: daurmanasyaṃ mano 'nyā ca vittistredhā anyadekadhā // VAkK_2.11 //
T07vakobhku:127: duḥkhe ca hitvā ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca // VAkK_2.12 //
T07vakobhku:129: nava bhavanayā pañca tvaheyānyapi na trayam // VAkK_2.13 //
T07vakobhku:131: teḥ ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpeṣu ekamuttare // VAkK_2.14 //
T07vakobhku:133: upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā // VAkK_2.15 //
T07vakobhku:134: kramamṛtyau tu catvāri śubhe sarvatra pañca ca /
T07vakobhku:139: saumanasyī ca duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ strīndriyādimān // VAkK_2.18 //
T07vakobhku:149: prāptyā vā pañcadhā caittā mahābhūmyādibhedataḥ // VAkK_2.23 //
T07vakobhku:150: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
T07vakobhku:153: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā // VAkK_2.25 //
T07vakobhku:163: middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikaṃ hi tat // VAkK_2.30 //
T07vakobhku:167: prema śraddhā gurutvaṃ hrīḥ te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ // VAkK_2.33 //
T07vakobhku:169: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ // VAkK_2.33 //
T07vakobhku:173: āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca // VAkK_2.35 //
T07vakobhku:180: nivṛtasya ca rūpasya kāme rūpasya nāgrajā /
T07vakobhku:189: śubhā dvivedyāniyatā ca āryasya āpyā prayogataḥ // VAkK_2.43 //
T07vakobhku:198: sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi āptayo dvidhā /
T07vakobhku:199: lakṣaṇāni ca niḥṣyandāḥ samāpattya samanvayāḥ // VAkK_2.48 //
T07vakobhku:204: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
T07vakobhku:213: saṃskṛtaṃ savisaṃyoga phalaṃ nāsaṃskṛtasya te // VAkK_2.55 //
T07vakobhku:217: niḥṣyando hetusadṛśaḥ visaṃyogaḥ kṣayo dhiyā // VAkK_2.57 //
T07vakobhku:220: varttamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛṇhanti dvau prayacchataḥ /
T07vakobhku:223: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ // VAkK_2.60 //
T07vakobhku:225: catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ // VAkK_2.61 //
T07vakobhku:228: nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvau hetū kurutaḥ trayaḥ /
T07vakobhku:229: jāyamāne tato 'nyau tu pratyayau tadviparyayāt // VAkK_2.63 //
T07vakobhku:231: dvābhyāmanye tu jāyante neśvarādeḥ kramādibhiḥ // VAkK_2.64 //
T07vakobhku:232: dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ bhautikasya tu pañcadhā /
T07vakobhku:236: kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni aṣṭābhya eva tat /
T07vakobhku:239: rūpe daśaikaṃ ca śubhāt navabhyastadanantaram // VAkK_2.68 //
T07vakobhku:240: aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ tasmāt ṣaṭ tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ /
T07vakobhku:241: tasmāt ṣaṭ evāmārūpye tasya nītiḥ śubhātpunaḥ // VAkK_2.69 //
T07vakobhku:242: nava cittāni tat ṣaṇṇāṃ nivṛtātsapta tattathā /
T07vakobhku:243: caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam asmāttu pañca aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt // VAkK_2.70 //
T07vakobhku:245: prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā // VAkK_2.71 //
T07vakobhku:248: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ śubhe /
T07vakobhku:249: trayāṇāṃ rūpaje śaikṣe caturṇāṃ tasya śeṣite // VAkK_2.73 //
T07vakobhku:250: abhidharmakośe indriyanirddeśo nāma dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
T07vakobhku:257: dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra caturthaṃ tvaṣṭabhūmikam // VAkK_3.2 //
T07vakobhku:259: nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ // VAkK_3.3 //
T07vakobhku:267: catvāraḥ sāsravāḥ skandhāḥ svabhūmāveva kevalam // VAkK_3.7 //
T07vakobhku:268: vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe /
T07vakobhku:281: sakalākṣaḥ apratighavān anivartyaḥ sa gandhabhuk // VAkK_3.14 //
T07vakobhku:299: upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ // VAkK_3.23 //
T07vakobhku:300: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
T07vakobhku:304: kleśāstrīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastu phalaṃ tathā /
T07vakobhku:306: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
T07vakobhku:307: vastu kleśāśca jāyante bhavāṅgānāmayaṃ nayaḥ // VAkK_3.27 //
T07vakobhku:312: nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ /
T07vakobhku:316: tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ pañca kāyikī caitasī parā /
T07vakobhku:320: svo 'ṣṭālambanam ārūpyo dvayoḥ dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ /
T07vakobhku:321: kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇā svaḥ ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ // VAkK_3.34 //
T07vakobhku:323: eko maule svaviṣayaḥ sarve 'ṣṭādaśa sāsravāḥ // VAkK_3.35 //
T07vakobhku:324: uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat atra tu kleśā iṣyate /
T07vakobhku:329: tridhānye traya ārūpye āhārasthitikaṃ jagat // VAkK_3.38 //
T07vakobhku:351: dvīpāḥ bahiścakravāḍaḥ sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ // VAkK_3.49 //
T07vakobhku:356: ābhyantaraḥ samudro 'sau triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /
T07vakobhku:357: ardhārdhenāparāḥ śītāḥ śeṣaṃ bāhyo mahodadheḥ // VAkK_3.52 //
T07vakobhku:358: lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca tatra tu /
T07vakobhku:361: pārśvatrayaṃ tathāsya ekaṃ sārdhaṃ triśatayojanam // VAkK_3.54 //
T07vakobhku:363: sārdhe dve madhyamasya aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ // VAkK_3.55 //
T07vakobhku:369: tadūrdhvaṃ sapta narakāḥ sarve 'ṣṭau ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ // VAkK_3.58 //
T07vakobhku:375: hemantānāṃ caturthe tu hīyate aharviparyayāt // VAkK_3.61 //
T07vakobhku:379: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ // VAkK_3.63 //
T07vakobhku:385: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu // VAkK_3.66 //
T07vakobhku:390: tata ūrdhva vimāneṣu devāḥ kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /
T07vakobhku:405: kāmināṃ rūpiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ tataḥ param // VAkK_3.76 //
T07vakobhku:409: ihāniyatam ante tu daśābdāḥ ādito 'mitam // VAkK_3.78 //
T07vakobhku:419: kalpaṃ tiraścāṃ pretānāṃ māsānhā śatapañcakam // VAkK_3.83 //
T07vakobhku:427: dhanuḥ pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam // VAkK_3.87 //
T07vakobhku:429: tatkṣaṇaḥ te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ triṃśad guṇottarāḥ // VAkK_3.88 //
T07vakobhku:431: saṃvatsaraḥ sonarātraḥ kalpo bahuvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // VAkK_3.89 //
T07vakobhku:435: utkarṣā apakarṣāśca kalpā aṣṭā daśāpare // VAkK_3.91 //
T07vakobhku:437: iti loko vivṛtto 'yaṃ kalpāṃstiṣṭhati viṃśatim // VAkK_3.92 //
T07vakobhku:444: ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ na ca dvau saha buddhavat /
T07vakobhku:447: prāgāsan rūpivat sattvāḥ rasarāgāttataḥ śanaiḥ // VAkK_3.97 //
T07vakobhku:451: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca yathākramam // VAkK_3.99 //
T07vakobhku:453: dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsāṃ yathākramam // VAkK_3.100 //
T07vakobhku:455: na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt // VAkK_3.101 //
T07vakobhku:456: saptāgninā adbhirekā evaṃ gate 'dbhiḥ saptake punaḥ /
T07vakobhku:458: abhidharmakośabhāṣye lokanirdeśo nāma tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam samāptamiti /
T07vakobhku:462: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
T07vakobhku:463: cetanā mānasaṃ karma tajjaṃ vākkāyakarmaṇī // VAkK_4.1 //
T07vakobhku:465: saṃsthānaṃ na gatiryasmātsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ vyayāt // VAkK_4.2 //
T07vakobhku:466: na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ /
T07vakobhku:467: dvigrāhyaṃ syāt na cāṇau tat vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ // VAkK_4.3 //
T07vakobhku:485: tulyaṃ muneḥ śubhaṃ yāvat nobhayaṃ tu vipākajam // VAkK_4.12 //
T07vakobhku:489: liṅgato nāmasaṃcārāt pṛthak te cāvirodhinaḥ // VAkK_4.14 //
T07vakobhku:503: madhyasthasyāsti cedādau madhyayā ūrdhvaṃ dvikālayā // VAkK_4.21 //
T07vakobhku:506: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
T07vakobhku:509: asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karma tatpathaḥ // VAkK_4.24 //
T07vakobhku:519: catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ // VAkK_4.29 //
T07vakobhku:523: tatpalanāt kila proktāḥ mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ // VAkK_4.31 //
T07vakobhku:525: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam // VAkK_4.32 //
T07vakobhku:527: yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtate // VAkK_4.33 //
T07vakobhku:533: asaṃvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ // VAkK_4.36 //
T07vakobhku:547: kurūṃśca saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ // VAkK_4.43 //
T07vakobhku:551: puṇyāpuṇyamaniñjaṃ ca sukhevedyādi ca trayam // VAkK_4.45 //
T07vakobhku:553: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati // VAkK_4.46 //
T07vakobhku:563: sarvatra caturākṣepaḥ śubhasya narake tridhā // VAkK_4.51 //
T07vakobhku:567: dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ tacca nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ // VAkK_4.53 //
T07vakobhku:569: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat // VAkK_4.54 //
T07vakobhku:571: tadbhūmyatyantavairāgyāt vipāke niyataṃ hi yat // VAkK_4.55 //
T07vakobhku:583: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat // VAkK_4.61 //
T07vakobhku:584: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
T07vakobhku:587: dṛgdheyaṃ kṛṣṇamanye anyatkṛṣṇaśuklaṃ tu kāmajam // VAkK_4.63 //
T07vakobhku:589: maunatrayam tridhā śaucaṃ sarva sucaritatrayam // VAkK_4.64 //
T07vakobhku:593: daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ // VAkK_4.66 //
T07vakobhku:595: dvividhāḥ sapta kuśalāḥ avijñaptiḥ samādhijāḥ // VAkK_4.67 //
T07vakobhku:603: sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // VAkK_4.71 //
T07vakobhku:604: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ anyāśrayodayāt /
T07vakobhku:613: pārūṣyamapriyaṃ sarva kliṣṭaṃ bhinna pralāpitā // VAkK_4.76 //
T07vakobhku:617: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca // VAkK_4.78 //
T07vakobhku:633: duḥśodhatvāt pariṣkāralobhotthaṃ cet na sūtrataḥ // VAkK_4.86 //
T07vakobhku:636: anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣaṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
T07vakobhku:637: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.88 //
T07vakobhku:639: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇī caite śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.89 //
T07vakobhku:641: madhyamā dve ajātasya phalāni trīṇyanāgatāḥ // VAkK_4.90 //
T07vakobhku:643: śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ // VAkK_4.91 //
T07vakobhku:644: dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
T07vakobhku:645: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca // VAkK_4.92 //
T07vakobhku:646: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛggheyasya tadādayaḥ /
T07vakobhku:647: te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ // VAkK_4.93 //
T07vakobhku:648: apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
T07vakobhku:649: ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana // VAkK_4.94 //
T07vakobhku:651: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca // VAkK_4.95 //
T07vakobhku:654: triṣu dvipeṣvānantarya śaṇḍhā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate /
T07vakobhku:659: avīcau pacyate kalpam adhikairadhikā rujaḥ // VAkK_4.99 //
T07vakobhku:660: bhikṣurdṛk carito vṛttī bhinatti anyatra bāliśān /
T07vakobhku:662: cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ jambūdvīpe navādibhiḥ /
T07vakobhku:665: sīmāyāṃ cāpyabaddhāyāṃ cakrabhedo na jāyate // VAkK_4.102 //
T07vakobhku:676: bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /
T07vakobhku:679: cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat // VAkK_4.109 //
T07vakobhku:685: puṇyaṃ kriyātha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā // VAkK_4.112 //
T07vakobhku:687: kāyavākkarma sotthānaṃ mahābhogyaphalaṃ ca tat // VAkK_4.113 //
T07vakobhku:690: dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ satkṛtyādi dadāti ataḥ /
T07vakobhku:695: agraṃ muktasya muktāya bodhisattvasya ca aṣṭamam // VAkK_4.117 //
T07vakobhku:705: pratikṣiptācca buddhena viśuddhaṃ tu caturguṇam // VAkK_4.122 //
T07vakobhku:707: samāhitaṃ tu kuśalaṃ bhāvanā cittavāsanāt // VAkK_4.123 //
T07vakobhku:709: caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt // VAkK_4.124 //
T07vakobhku:713: lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam // VAkK_4.126 //
T07vakobhku:714: sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭāḥ dharmāḥ śubhāmalāḥ /
T07vakobhku:720: māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca te punaḥ // VAkK_5.1 //
T07vakobhku:736: nitīraṇāt samāropāt saṃjñācitte tu tadvaśāt // VAkK_5.9 //
T07vakobhku:740: nāsmitā dṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt kaukṛtyaṃ nāpi cāśubham // VAkK_5.11 //
T07vakobhku:742: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yā // VAkK_5.12 //
T07vakobhku:750: na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhyagrabhāvataḥ // VAkK_5.16 //
T07vakobhku:754: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ // VAkK_5.18 //
T07vakobhku:756: antagrāhaḥ sahābhyāṃ ca mohaḥ śeṣāstvihāśubhāḥ // VAkK_5.19 //
T07vakobhku:766: ajaiḥ sarvatra śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ // VAkK_5.24 //
T07vakobhku:770: tṛtīyaḥ śobhanaḥ adhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitāḥ // VAkK_5.26 //
T07vakobhku:771: kiṃ vighnaṃ tatkathaṃ nānyat adhvāyogaḥ tathā sataḥ /
T07vakobhku:772: ajātanaṣṭatā kena gambhīrā khalu dharmatā // VAkK_5.27 //
T07vakobhku:774: prāk prahīṇe prakare ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ // VAkK_5.28 //
T07vakobhku:784: rāgaḥ svadṛṣṭau mānaśca dveṣo 'nyatra ityanukramaḥ // VAkK_5.33 //
T07vakobhku:788: mohena anuśayā eva rūpārūpye bhavāsravaḥ // VAkK_5.35 //
T07vakobhku:794: upādānāni avidyā tu grāhikā ne ti miśritā // VAkK_5.38 //
T07vakobhku:816: anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā // VAkK_5.49 //
T07vakobhku:826: upakleśāḥ svatantrāśca ṣaḍ vijñānāśrayāḥ pare // VAkK_5.54 //
T07vakobhku:827: sukhābhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ dveṣo viparyayāt /
T07vakobhku:832: upanāhaḥ pradāśaśca mātsaryaṃ tu viparyayāt // VAkK_5.57 //
T07vakobhku:833: māyā śāṭhyamatho mrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā madaḥ /
T07vakobhku:840: pratipakṣaḥ prahātavyaḥ kleśa ālambanāt mataḥ // VAkK_5.61 //
T07vakobhku:846: ekā dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te tathordhvaṃ tisra eva tāḥ // VAkK_5.64 //
T07vakobhku:848: tisraḥ parijñāḥ ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ jñānasya śeṣitāḥ // VAkK_5.65 //
T07vakobhku:851: āryamārgasya sarvāḥ dve laukikasya anvayasya ca /
T07vakobhku:852: dharmajñānasya tisrastu ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca // VAkK_5.67 //
T07vakobhku:856: bhāvanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaḍibharekayā vā dvayena vā // VAkK_5.69 //
T07vakobhku:858: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na // VAkK_5.70 //
T07vakobhku:867: nirodhamārga iti eṣāṃ yathābhisamayaṃ kramaḥ // VAkK_6.2 //
T07vakobhku:869: manāpā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ // VAkK_6.3 //
T07vakobhku:870: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
T07vakobhku:887: kāmāśrayā na bāhyānām ṣaḍ vidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ // VAkK_6.12 //
T07vakobhku:889: naiḥṣyandikau nādhareṇa lakṣyete manasā ca tau // VAkK_6.13 //
T07vakobhku:897: ṣoḍaśākāram ūṣmabhyo mūrdhānaḥ te 'pi tādṛśāḥ // VAkK_6.17 //
T07vakobhku:899: tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ dvidhā tadvat kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam // VAkK_6.18 //
T07vakobhku:901: tathāgradharmāḥ sarve tu pañcaskandhāḥ vināptibhiḥ // VAkK_6.19 //
T07vakobhku:903: anāgamyā ntaradhyānabhūmikam dve tvadho 'pi vā // VAkK_6.20 //
T07vakobhku:906: ādye dve parihāṇyā ca maulestatraiva satyadṛk /
T07vakobhku:909: śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt trīṇyapītaraḥ // VAkK_6.23 //
T07vakobhku:924: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
T07vakobhku:928: navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau tathā guṇāḥ /
T07vakobhku:953: lokottareṇa vairāgyaṃ bhavāgrāt anyato dvidhā // VAkK_6.45 //
T07vakobhku:963: kṣayajñānamaśaikṣo vā dṛṣṭiḥ sarvasya sārhataḥ // VAkK_6.50 //
T07vakobhku:969: laukikāptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalam // VAkK_6.53 //
T07vakobhku:972: kāme trayāptiḥ antyasya triṣu nordhva hi dṛkpathaḥ /
T07vakobhku:973: asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt // VAkK_6.55 //
T07vakobhku:979: śaikṣānāryāśca ṣaḍgotrāḥ saṃcāro nāsti darśane // VAkK_6.58 //
T07vakobhku:981: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā // VAkK_6.59 //
T07vakobhku:982: mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ tadakārya karoti na /
T07vakobhku:985: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣastu ṣaṭ yataḥ // VAkK_6.61 //
T07vakobhku:987: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ // VAkK_6.62 //
T07vakobhku:989: pudgalāḥ sapta ṣaṭ tvete dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ // VAkK_6.63 //
T07vakobhku:997: saptatriṃśattu tatpakṣyāḥ nāmato dravyato daśa // VAkK_6.67 //
T07vakobhku:998: śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
T07vakobhku:1001: pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve guṇāḥ prāyogikāstu te // VAkK_6.69 //
T07vakobhku:1003: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam // VAkK_6.70 //
T07vakobhku:1005: sakalāḥ prathame dhyāne anāgamye prītivarjitāḥ // VAkK_6.71 //
T07vakobhku:1007: dhyānāntare ca śīlāṅgaistābhyāṃ ca triṣvarūpiṣu // VAkK_6.72 //
T07vakobhku:1012: mārgaśca dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca nirmalāḥ /
T07vakobhku:1013: noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅgaṃ baddhatvāt sā punardvidhā // VAkK_6.75 //
T07vakobhku:1015: sāṅgaḥ saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā // VAkK_6.76 //
T07vakobhku:1022: abhidharmakośe mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti //
T07vakobhku:1026: tadanyobhayathāryā dhīḥ anyā jñānaṃ dṛśaśca ṣaṭ // VAkK_7.1 //
T07vakobhku:1031: te eva satyabhedena catvāri ete caturvidhe /
T07vakobhku:1034: bhūmyakṣapudgalotkrāntaṃ naṣṭājātaṃ na vetti tat // VAkK_7.5 //
T07vakobhku:1044: tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam // VAkK_7.10 //
T07vakobhku:1048: nāmalaḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo 'nya ākāraḥ anye 'sti śāstrataḥ // VAkK_7.12 //
T07vakobhku:1050: ākārayanti sālambāḥ sarvamākāryate tu sat // VAkK_7.13 //
T07vakobhku:1052: dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ tathaiva ṣaṭ // VAkK_7.14 //
T07vakobhku:1056: trīṇi catvāri śeṣāṇi dharmadhīgocaro nava // VAkK_7.16 //
T07vakobhku:1058: caturṇāṃ daśa naikasya yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa // VAkK_7.17 //
T07vakobhku:1067: ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya vītarāgasya sapta tu /
T07vakobhku:1073: navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne akopyasya daśa bhāvanā /
T07vakobhku:1076: sāsravāśca kṣayajñāne labdhapūrvaṃ na bhāvyate // VAkK_7.26 //
T07vakobhku:1080: sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni aṣṭau karmaphale nava // VAkK_7.28 //
T07vakobhku:1082: daśa vā saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye // VAkK_7.29 //
T07vakobhku:1097: tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ sarvālambaṃ tu tat tathā /
T07vakobhku:1098: dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ // VAkK_7.37 //
T07vakobhku:1102: daśa ṣaḍvārthasaṃvit sā sarvatra anye tu sāṃvṛtam // VAkK_7.39 //
T07vakobhku:1108: jñāta sākṣīkriyābhijñā ṣaḍ vidhā muktimārgadhīḥ // VAkK_7.42 //
T07vakobhku:1110: kṣayābhijñā balaṃ yadvat pañca dhyānacatuṣṭaye // VAkK_7.43 //
T07vakobhku:1114: tisro vidyāḥ avidyāyāḥ pūrvāntādau nivarttanāt // VAkK_7.45 //
T07vakobhku:1116: iṣṭe śaikṣasya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ // VAkK_7.46 //
T07vakobhku:1117: ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi śāsanam /
T07vakobhku:1119: ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca gatistridhā /
T07vakobhku:1122: rūpāptaṃ dve tu nirmāṇacittaistāni caturdaśa // VAkK_7.49 //
T07vakobhku:1123: yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca nordhvajam /
T07vakobhku:1124: tallābho dhyānavat śuddhāttatsvataśca tato 'pi te // VAkK_7.50 //
T07vakobhku:1130: ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā // VAkK_7.53 //
T07vakobhku:1137: cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
T07vakobhku:1138: jānate nārakā ādau nṛṇāṃ notpattilabhikam // VAkK_7.56 //
T07vakobhku:1156: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
T07vakobhku:1158: dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca prasrabdhi sukhamādyayoḥ /
T07vakobhku:1159: śraddhā prasādaḥ prītistu saumanasyaṃ dvidhāgamāt // VAkK_8.9 //
T07vakobhku:1163: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam // VAkK_8.11 //
T07vakobhku:1167: dvitīyādau tadādyāptaṃ akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat // VAkK_8.13 //
T07vakobhku:1169: anāsravaṃ tu vairāgyāt kliṣṭaṃ hānyupapattitaḥ // VAkK_8.14 //
T07vakobhku:1171: utpadyate tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam // VAkK_8.15 //
T07vakobhku:1172: kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam /
T07vakobhku:1173: cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kliṣṭāttu nottaram // VAkK_8.16 //
T07vakobhku:1176: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
T07vakobhku:1177: gatvāgamya dvidhā bhūmīraṣṭau śliṣṭai kalaṅghitāḥ // VAkK_8.18 //
T07vakobhku:1181: satṛṣṇāḥ svabhavālambāḥ dhyānaṃ sadviṣayaṃ śubham // VAkK_8.20 //
T07vakobhku:1183: anāsraveṇa hīyante kleśāḥ sāmantakena ca // VAkK_8.21 //
T07vakobhku:1185: ārya cādyaṃ tridhā kecit atarka dhyānamantaram // VAkK_8.22 //
T07vakobhku:1195: samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ subhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 //
T07vakobhku:1199: maitryadveṣaḥ api karuṇā muditā sumanaskatā // VAkK_8.29 //
T07vakobhku:1202: dhyānayormuditā anyāni ṣaṭ su kecittu pañcasu /
T07vakobhku:1203: na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ nṛṣveva janyante tryanvito dhruvam // VAkK_8.31 //
T07vakobhku:1205: tṛtīyo 'ntye sa cālobhaḥ śubhārūpyāḥ samāhitāḥ // VAkK_8.32 //
T07vakobhku:1211: dve dvitīyavat anyāni punaḥ śubhavimokṣavat // VAkK_8.35 //
T07vakobhku:1212: daśa kṛtsnāni alobhāṣṭau dhyāne 'ntye gocaraḥ punaḥ /
T07vakobhku:1217: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 //
T07vakobhku:1219: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 //
T07vakobhku:1221: yaddurguhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau munayaḥ pramāṇam // VAkK_8.40 //
T07vakobhku:1222: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
T07vakobhku:1224: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhūrdhareṣu ca /
T07vakobhku:1225: jagatyanāthe gaṇaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate // VAkK_8.42 //
T07vakobhku:1227: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // VAkK_8.43 //
